com.linecorp.armeria.server.tomcat

Class TomcatService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.tomcat.TomcatService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpService, Service<HttpRequest,HttpResponse>

    public final class TomcatService
extends Object
implements HttpService
    An HttpService that dispatches its requests to a web application running in an embedded Tomcat.
    See Also:
    TomcatServiceBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Connector connector()
      Returns Tomcat Connector.
      static TomcatService forClassPath(Class<?> clazz)
      Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the root directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the specified class is located at.
      static TomcatService forClassPath(Class<?> clazz, String docBase)
      Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the specified document base directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the specified class is located at.
      static TomcatService forConnector(Connector connector)
      Creates a new TomcatService from an existing Tomcat Connector instance.
      static TomcatService forConnector(String hostname, Connector connector)
      Creates a new TomcatService from an existing Tomcat Connector instance.
      static TomcatService forCurrentClassPath()
      Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the root directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the caller class is located at.
      static TomcatService forCurrentClassPath(String docBase)
      Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the specified document base directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the caller class is located at.
      static TomcatService forFileSystem(Path docBase)
      Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the specified document base, which can be a directory or a JAR/WAR file.
      static TomcatService forFileSystem(String docBase)
      Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the specified document base, which can be a directory or a JAR/WAR file.
      static TomcatService forTomcat(Tomcat tomcat)
      Creates a new TomcatService from an existing Tomcat instance.
      HttpResponse serve(ServiceRequestContext ctx, HttpRequest req)
      Serves an incoming Request.
      void serviceAdded(ServiceConfig cfg)
      Invoked when this Service has been added to a Server with the specified configuration.

        public static TomcatService forCurrentClassPath()
        Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the root directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the caller class is located at.

        Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the specified document base directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the caller class is located at.

        public static TomcatService forClassPath(Class<?> clazz)
        Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the root directory inside the JAR/WAR/directory where the specified class is located at.

                                         String docBase)

        public static TomcatService forFileSystem(String docBase)
        Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the specified document base, which can be a directory or a JAR/WAR file.

        public static TomcatService forFileSystem(Path docBase)
        Creates a new TomcatService with the web application at the specified document base, which can be a directory or a JAR/WAR file.

      • forTomcat

        public static TomcatService forTomcat(Tomcat tomcat)
        Creates a new TomcatService from an existing Tomcat instance. If the specified Tomcat instance is not configured properly, the returned TomcatService may respond with '503 Service Not Available' error.

      • forConnector

        public static TomcatService forConnector(Connector connector)
        Creates a new TomcatService from an existing Tomcat Connector instance. If the specified Connector instance is not configured properly, the returned TomcatService may respond with '503 Service Not Available' error.

      • forConnector

        public static TomcatService forConnector(String hostname,
                                         Connector connector)
        Creates a new TomcatService from an existing Tomcat Connector instance. If the specified Connector instance is not configured properly, the returned TomcatService may respond with '503 Service Not Available' error.

      • serviceAdded

        public void serviceAdded(ServiceConfig cfg)
                  throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Service
        Invoked when this Service has been added to a Server with the specified configuration. Please note that this method can be invoked more than once if ths Service has been added more than once.

        Throws:
